snippet: Democratic Party operatives descended on Iowa to set up an anti-Romney war room and preview their strategy should Mitt Romney become the Republican nominee.
abstract: Democratic Party operatives descended on Iowa to set up an anti-Romney war room and preview their strategy should Mitt Romney become the Republican nominee.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

lead_paragraph: DES MOINES -- Mitt Romney is fighting to be the top choice of Republicans here in Iowa, but he's already the top target for Democrats.

headline.main: Democrats Descend on Iowa to Hit Romney
